name: mach-bike
effect: Increases movement speed outside or in caves.  Faster than the acro bike.  Allows the trainer to ascend muddy slopes.
short_effect: Faster than the Acro Bike, and can ride up sandy slopes and across cracked floors.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A folding bicycle
that more than
doubles foot speed.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A folding bicycle
that doubles your
speed or better.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A folding bicycle that is at least
twice as fast as walking.
